casebody.data:
Joanna Lawrence et al. v. Orest T. Dubno, Commissioner of Revenue Services (4556)

Hull, Spallone and Bieluch, Js.

Argued September 17 decided October 3, 1986 Robert H. Rubin, with whom, on the brief, was Jamie K. Gerard, for the appellants (plaintiffs). PaulM. Scimonelli, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, were Joseph I. Lieberman, attorney general, and Ralph G. Murphy, assistant attorney general, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
